title: 共產黨心急制裁蓬佩奧，但點估到蓬佩奧有機會成為下屆美國總統

replies.msg:
美國前總統特朗普爭取連任失敗，其昔日舊部也要另謀高就。在任內取得顯著外交成就的前國務卿蓬佩奧（Mike Pompeo）近日就決定加盟保守派著名智庫「哈德遜研究所」（Hudson Institute），由於該智庫經常有機會參與共和黨的政策討論，以及接觸到共和黨金主，故此被認為是他為2024年競選總統的大計鋪路。


https://hk.appledaily.com/international/20210127/VLKHKNDY4FBKHA7G2K36UVU66Y/

replies.msg:
你睇清楚先
「Foreign nationals are prohibited from making contributions, donations or expenditures in connection with any election—federal, state or local. 」
https://www.fec.gov/help-candidates-and-committees/taking-receipts-pac/who-can-and-cant-contribute-nonconnected-pac/
驚你睇唔清楚，quotes 埋個解釋你睇

「foreign nationals:
An individual who is not a citizen of the United States or a national of the United States and has not been lawfully admitted to the U.S. for permanent residence, as defined in 8 U.S.C. § 1101(a)(20); or
A foreign principal, as defined in 22 U.S.C. § 611(b).」

任何係海外話募捐去支持美國選舉既唔係呃錢就係犯法野
